trans-unit.source: A control that displays an image and responds to mouse clicks on the image.
trans-unit.target: 顯示影像並回應在影像上按一下滑鼠按鍵的控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Determining Where the User Clicked](#DeterminingWhereTheUserClicked) - [ImageButton Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction Use the ImageButton control to display an image that responds to mouse clicks.
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容:-[簡介](#introduction) - [判斷使用者所按的位置](#DeterminingWhereTheUserClicked) - [ImageButton 控制項和驗證](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [協助工具](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法](#DeclarativeSyntax) # # 簡介使用 ImageButton 控制項來顯示影像回應滑鼠點按動作。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command> events are raised when the ImageButton control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 同時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command>ImageButton 已按下控制項時，會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A> event handler to make the ImageButton control behave like a Command button.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A>使行為與命令按鈕一樣的 ImageButton 控制項的事件處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: A command name can be associated with the control by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 命令名稱可以是使用與控制項相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows multiple ImageButton controls to be placed on the same Web page.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓多個 ImageButton 控制項放置在相同網頁上。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A> property can then be programmatically identified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A> event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each ImageButton control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>屬性然後以程式設計方式識別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A>事件處理常式，以判斷每個 ImageButton 已按下控制項時執行適當的動作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandArgument%2A> property can also be used to pass additional information about the command, such as specifying ascending order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandArgument%2A>屬性也可用來將傳遞命令，例如指定遞增順序的其他資訊。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the ImageButton control is similar to using the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ImageButton 控制，類似於使用 ASP.NET<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Button Web Server Controls Content Map](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[按鈕 Web 伺服器控制項內容地圖](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: and the class overview for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 類別概觀和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: ## Determining Where the User Clicked By using the event handler, you can programmatically determine the coordinates where the image is clicked.
trans-unit.target: # # 判斷使用者所使用的按事件處理常式，您可以透過程式設計方式判斷映像所按的位置座標。

trans-unit.source: You can then code a response, based on the values of the coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以撰寫回應時，根據座標的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that the origin (0, 0) is located at the upper left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，（0，0） 的原點位於影像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: ## ImageButton Controls and Validation By default, page validation is performed when an ImageButton control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: # # ImageButton 控制項和驗證依預設，頁面驗證是在 ImageButton 已按下控制項時執行。

trans-unit.source: Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面驗證會判斷是否與驗證頁面上的控制項通過所有驗證控制項所指定的驗證規則相關聯輸入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To prevent page validation from occurring, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免發生頁面驗證，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # 有關如何設定這個控制項，使其產生標記，並符合協助工具標準，協助工具的資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # 宣告式語法``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>的新執行個體使用這個建構函式

trans-unit.source: Adds the attributes of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> to the output stream for rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: 新增的屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>至用戶端上呈現的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnPreRender%2A> method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnPreRender%2A>衍生的自訂類別時，方法使用主要由控制項開發人員<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnPreRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: The output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: 要呈現用戶端上輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否執行驗證時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: By default, page validation is performed when an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會執行頁面驗證時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面驗證會判斷是否與驗證頁面上的控制項通過所有驗證控制項所指定的驗證規則相關聯輸入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked by using the CausesValidation property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定，或決定是否要在用戶端和伺服器上執行驗證時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>使用 CausesValidation 屬性按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: To prevent validation from being performed, set the CausesValidation property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免執行驗證，請將 CausesValidation 屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly set to `false` for a Reset or Clear button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常會設定為`false`重設或 [清除] 按鈕，以防止在按下按鈕時執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the CausesValidation property is set to `true`, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.ValidationGroup%2A> property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control causes validation.
trans-unit.target: 當 CausesValidation 屬性的值設定為`true`，您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.ValidationGroup%2A>屬性，以指定的驗證群組名稱的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>驗證。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation is performed when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control is clicked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在執行驗證，則當<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項是按; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>按下。

trans-unit.source: The Click event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Click 事件引發時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This event causes the page to be posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個事件會導致頁面回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>按下。

trans-unit.source: The Command event is raised when an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 命令事件引發時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Command event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 命令引發的形式在控制項階層架構透過`BubbleEvent`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This event causes the page to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個事件會造成頁面回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an optional argument that provides additional information about the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選擇性引數，提供其他資訊有關<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName*>

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> controls are related and share the same value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A> property, such as `Sort`.
trans-unit.target: 某些情況下，多個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項彼此相關，而且共用相同的值為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>屬性，例如`Sort`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to supplement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A> property with additional information about the command to perform, such as `Ascending`.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來補充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>屬性，才能執行這類命令的其他資訊與`Ascending`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A> and CommandArgument properties are typically used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A> event handler to determine the action to perform when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>CommandArgument 屬性通常用於和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A>事件處理常式，以判斷要執行時的動作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An optional argument that supplements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName*> property.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性引數，會補充說明<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command name associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與相關聯的命令名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the command to perform when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked, such as `Sort`, `Cancel`, or `Edit`.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定要執行時的命令<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>按一下控制項時，例如`Sort`， `Cancel`，或`Edit`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: This allows multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> controls to be placed on the same Web page.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓多個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>放置在相同網頁上的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: The value in this property can then be programmatically identified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A> event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性中的值再以程式設計方式識別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A>事件處理常式，以決定適當的動作執行時每個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Supplemental information about the command, such as specifying ascending sort order, can be included by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 補充資訊的命令，例如指定遞增的排序次序中，可以使用包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The command name associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 與相關聯的命令名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> can be clicked to perform a post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>按一下就可執行回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Use the Enabled property to specify whether an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> can be clicked to perform a post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用已啟用屬性來指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>按一下就可執行回傳至伺服器。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `false`, the control renders on the page, but does not raise a post back event when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將此屬性設定為`false`，該控制項呈現在頁面上，但不會引發的回傳事件時按下。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項已啟用。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control generates an alternate-text attribute for an empty string value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否產生空白的字串值的替代文字屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property using an `alt` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>屬性使用`alt`屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control does not include the `alt` attribute to specify the alternate-text in the control rendering.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>未設定屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項不包含`alt`屬性來指定替代文字控制項的呈現。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XHTML document type definition requires the `alt` attribute on image controls.
trans-unit.target: XHTML 文件類型定義需要`alt`影像控制項上的屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, accessibility best practices recommend that image controls that do not convey information relevant to the context of the Web page should not specify an `alt` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 不過，協助工具最佳作法建議並不會傳遞網頁的內容相關的資訊的影像控制項不應該指定`alt`屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can meet both XHTML and accessibility requirements by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定符合 XHTML 和協助工具需求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control does not generate an alternate-text attribute when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*> property is empty.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項不會產生替代文字屬性時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*>屬性是空的。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定此屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> object that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control's postback behavior.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref>物件，代表<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項的回傳行為。

trans-unit.source: The GetPostBackOptions method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> object that represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control's postback behavior.
trans-unit.target: GetPostBackOptions 方法會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>物件，代表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項的回傳行為。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> object is then typically passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%28System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions%29?displayProperty=fullName> method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to postback to the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>物件通常隨後會傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%28System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法，用來取得用戶端指令碼函式的參考，叫用時，會導致回傳至網頁伺服器。</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%28System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法使用主要由控制項開發人員在擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control's postback behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"> </xref>表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項的回傳行為。

trans-unit.source: Processes posted data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 處理張貼資料<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的自訂類別主要由控制項開發人員使用 Selectionlist 成員<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> checks to see if the x and y values were posted, which indicates that the image was clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>檢查 x 和 y 已張貼值，表示使用者已按下映像。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> then registers with the page that it wants to raise an event during the event-processing phase.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>使用它想要引發事件的事件處理階段期間的頁面，然後註冊。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: The key value used to index an entry in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用來編製索引的項目集合中的索引鍵的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that contains post information.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> ，包含張貼資訊。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for all cases.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>所有案例。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click"></xref> event and allows you to handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click"></xref> event directly.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click"></xref>事件，並可讓您處理<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click"></xref>直接事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click>

trans-unit.source: By using the OnClick event handler, you can programmatically determine the coordinates where the image is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用 OnClick 事件處理常式，您可以透過程式設計方式判斷映像所按的位置座標。

trans-unit.source: You can then code a response, based on the values of these coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以撰寫回應時，根據這些座標值。

trans-unit.source: Note that the origin (0, 0) is located at the upper left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，（0，0） 的原點位於影像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnClick 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the client-side script that executes when an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用戶端指令碼時執行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click"></xref>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the OnClientClick property to specify additional client-side script that executes when an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定其他的用戶端指令碼執行時使用 OnClientClick 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: The script that you specify for this property is rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control's `OnClick` attribute in addition to the control's predefined client-side script.
trans-unit.target: 您指定這個屬性會在轉譯的指令碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項的`OnClick`屬性除了控制項的預先定義的用戶端指令碼。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The client-side script that executes when an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端指令碼時執行<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click"></xref>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command"></xref> event and allows you to handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command"></xref> event directly.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command"></xref>事件，並可讓您處理<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command"></xref>直接事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command>

trans-unit.source: The OnCommand event handler is used to make the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control behave like a Command button.
trans-unit.target: OnCommand 事件處理常式用來進行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項行為與命令按鈕一樣。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: A command name can be associated with the control by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 命令名稱可以是使用與控制項相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> controls to be placed on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓多個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>放置在網頁上的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: The value in this property can then be programmatically identified in the OnCommand event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性中的值可以再以程式設計方式識別 OnCommand 的事件處理常式，來判斷適當的動作執行時每個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandArgument%2A> property can also be used to pass additional information about the command, such as specifying ascending order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandArgument%2A>屬性也可用來將傳遞命令，例如指定遞增順序的其他資訊。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command> event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command>就會引發事件的形式在控制項階層架構透過`BubbleEvent`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnCommand method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnCommand 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the image has been clicked prior to rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否已在用戶端上呈現以前，先按一下映像。

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的自訂類別主要由控制項開發人員使用 OnPreRender 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>物件，其中包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面的 URL，若要張貼至從目前頁面上時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The PostBackUrl property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: PostBackUrl 屬性可讓您執行 post 使用跨網頁<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: Set the PostBackUrl property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 將 PostBackUrl 屬性設定網頁的 URL 時張貼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: For example, specifying `Page2.aspx` causes the page that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control to post to `Page2.aspx`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，指定`Page2.aspx`會使得包含的網頁<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>張貼到控制項`Page2.aspx`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the PostBackUrl property, the page posts back to itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不指定 PostBackUrl 屬性的值，在網頁回傳至本身。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A> property is `true` before processing the postback.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 時執行伺服器端驗證使用的控制項與跨網頁回傳時，您應該檢查頁面的<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A>屬性是`true`之前處理回傳。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the PreviousPage.
trans-unit.target: 在跨網頁回傳，若要檢查頁面會是上一頁。

trans-unit.source: The following Visual Basic code shows how this is done: ``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ``` For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 下列 Visual Basic 程式碼會示範如何完成這︰``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ```跨網頁公佈技術的詳細資訊，請參閱[跨網頁張貼在 ASP.NET Web Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 網頁的 URL，將從目前頁面上時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")，會使頁面回傳至本身。

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制當回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的自訂類別主要由控制項開發人員使用 RaisePostBackEvent 成員<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: This method is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control, when it is clicked, to raise a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click> event and, if defined, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在內部使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項，它按一下時，引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click>事件和定義，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知 ASP.NET 應用程式的狀態<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項已變更。

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的自訂類別主要由控制項開發人員使用 RaisePostDataChangedEvent 成員<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden in a derived class to raise change events for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 引發變更事件的衍生類別中覆寫這個方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制當回傳至伺服器。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the <xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref> attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否應該設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref>屬性來呈現之 HTML 項目的"disabled"當控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指出如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than `4.0`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性表示的 ASP.NET 版本低於`4.0`，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法是明確介面成員實作。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control, used to index the `postCollection`.
trans-unit.target: 使用之控制項的金鑰識別碼索引`postCollection`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> collection that contains value information indexed by control identifiers.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref>以控制識別項的集合，其中包含值資訊編製索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the server control's state changes as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果伺服器控制項的狀態因回傳而變更，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.target: 事件引數

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Text%2A> member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Text%2A>成員是明確介面成員實作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: The text caption that is displayed for the button.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕的顯示文字標題。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> value that corresponds to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref>值，對應為<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The TagKey property is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 主要由控制項開發人員使用 TagKey 屬性衍生的自訂類別時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: Use the TagKey property to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag> value associated with an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: TagKey 屬性用於判斷<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>與相關聯的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>

trans-unit.source: This property overrides the base implementation to always return `HtmlTextWriterTag.Input`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會覆寫基底實作以永遠傳回`HtmlTextWriterTag.Input`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*>

trans-unit.source: The Text property is not intended to be called directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Text 屬性不是直接從您的程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*> property.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項群組的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證。

trans-unit.source: Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category.
trans-unit.target: 驗證群組可讓您將驗證頁面上的控制項指派給特定的類別。

trans-unit.source: Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page.
trans-unit.target: 每個驗證群組可以獨立於其他的驗證群組頁面上進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidationGroup property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 若要為其指定的驗證群組名稱中使用 ValidationGroup 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: This property has an effect only when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性沒有作用時，才值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A>屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the ValidationGroup property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定 ValidationGroup 的屬性值僅驗證控制，屬於指定的群組會驗證當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項回傳至伺服器。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for this property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定此屬性的值和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A>屬性設定為`true`，控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證所有驗證控制項在頁面上驗證群組未指派。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項群組<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref>控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。
